Containers.Name: malfurious-postfixadmin
Containers.Description: This docker is designed to be used with malfurious-mailserver, malfurious-redis, and malfurious-roundcube. [b]This docker requires a mysql database to connect to, preferably MariaDB. Create a database named "postfix" with a user named "postfix". Set your own password for the user.[/b] [b]For DBPASS fill in the password you used when you setup your mysql database for user postfix.[/b] [b]Also, under Extra Parameters, you need to replace the "xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx" in "--add-host mariadb:xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx", where the xxx are the IP address of your mysql server.[/b] [b]Also under Extra Parameters, replace "mail.domain.td" in "-h mail.domain.td" with the hostname for your mailserver.[/b] [b]Port 8888 is for the postfix webgui.[/b] [b]Finally, all credit for this docker goes to Hardware, I am merely formatting it for use in UnRaid as a template. Any other configuration settings you may be interested will be listed at: https://github.com/hardware/postfixadmin [/b]
Containers.Overview: Postfixadmin is an administrative interface for malfurious-mailserver.
